name: admin.usergroups.addChannels
desc: Add up to one hundred default channels to an IDP group.

channel_ids.desc: Comma separated string of channel IDs.

team_id.desc: The workspace to add default channels in.

usergroup_id.desc: ID of the IDP group to add default channels for.

errors.channel_not_found: At least one of the provided channel IDs could not be found, or one of the channels has a type that is not supported.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this workspace.
errors.invalid_auth: The workspace specified is not part of this organization.
errors.invalid_channels_limit: The number of channel IDs passed in is larger than 100.
errors.not_an_admin: The token provided is not associated with an Org Admin or Owner.
errors.not_an_enterprise: The token passed in does not belong to an Enterprise organization.
errors.team_not_found: The workspace provided was not found.
errors.usergroup_not_found: The IDP group provided was not found.
errors.usergroup_not_linked_to_team: The IDP group provided is not linked to the workspace.
errors.usergroup_team_not_provisioned: The IDP group provided is linked to a workspace that has auto-provision disabled.
